mapper.sql: ID, post_author AS postAuthor, post_date AS postDate, post_date_gmt AS postDateGmt, post_content AS postContent, post_title AS postTitle, post_excerpt AS postExcerpt, post_status AS postStatus, comment_status AS commentStatus, ping_status AS pingStatus, post_password AS postPassword, post_name AS postName, to_ping AS toPing, pinged, post_modified AS postModified, post_modified_gmt AS postModifiedGmt, post_content_filtered AS postContentFiltered, post_parent AS postParent, guid, menu_order AS menuOrder, post_type AS postType, post_mime_type AS postMimeType, comment_count AS commentCount
